title: Flames and Earthquakes
description: They say that time heals all wounds, but it’s hard to move on when you don’t know the whole story. How do you live in your new reality, when the past keeps pulling you back?Kat’s story continues. Eight years later she finally has everything she wanted. She’s happy with a great job, a fiancé, and lives in the city of her dreams. Ben is good for her, it’s never complicated and she can always count on him. But lately, he’s been only focused on his work, and right when she’s overthinking their relationship, Noah, her ex-boyfriend comes back into her life. The love of her life, who left without even a goodbye. Will she be able to get closure from their past and move on or will she try to forgive him?Noah’s been running away from his feelings for years, doing dirty work for his boss. Ever since he left her behind, he couldn’t sleep peacefully. Believing she has moved on happily, he never returned to her. But their paths cross again when his newfound brother moved to the same city she lives in and becomes friends with Kat’s sister. He realizes that he never lost feelings for her, even after eight years. Is she the one for him or will he finally let go of their past? Will his dark past catch up to him again?
author: Tina Klement
